attributes.action: Make ministers appear on GMB if they are appearing on other networks that day.
attributes.additional_details: Government ministers are being told not appear on ITV’s Good Morning Britain following a series of gruelling interviews.
attributes.background: We live in a democracy and ministers should not be allowed to choose which mainstream networks and programs they will appear on because they don’t like to be scrutinised and asked difficult questions. If Minsters are appearing on BBC breakfast they should also appear on Good Morning Britain.
